TextView.android:text: After the day filled with action-packed events, thousands of people await when the spotlight shifts to the magnificent Open Air Theatre which hosts some of the most captivating shows from around the world, enthralling the 10,000 strong audience beyond expectations.
Technoholix is a perfect blend of science technology with the additive ingredient of entertainment. Justifying its name, 'Technoholix' promises to leave you addicted to technology and entertainment.
There is no registration or fees required to attend the technoholix at Techfest. You are required to carry a valid photo ID card along with you.
